name: Project Aine
description:
What is Project Aine?
This is a story about a group of people headed by Kaito, who is looking for carriers of dragon blades and a girl named Aine.

But why should they look for her?
Everything has its own reasons, they will unfold as the game progresses.
Who is Kaito, Aine and dragon blade owners?
With the first we will get acquainted with the very first mission. The second, in turn, is not yet present in the game, but we will learn about it a little later.
The owners of dragon blades will meet often and drag us into dynamic battles.
Unfortunately, now it is impossible to fully feel the story, because everything is based on my story, which has not yet been completed. At the moment, only the first chapter of my story is implemented in the game.

Why Project Aine?
The name reflects the essence of the game - to find and punish Dr. Aine Takagi for her insidious experiments. Also in the course of the game, the characters will try to understand themselves, and we will monitor their ups and downs.
In the game you are waiting for: very unexpected plot twists, betrayals, intrigues and much more.
